content.query:
sentinelscanreport_CL 
 | where type_s =~ "Detection"
 | where count_d != 0
 | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 4h), rulename_s
 | render columnchart
content.title: Detection Rules triggered per 4 hours

content.query:
sentinelscanreport_CL 
 | where type_s =~ "Detection"
 | where count_d != 0
 | project rulename_s,type_s, query_s, description_s, severity_s, Category, Id = pid_s, TimeGenerated
 | extend ['Rule Name'] = rulename_s, Query =  query_s, Description = description_s, Severity = ['severity_s']
 | extend severitylevel = iff(Severity=~'High',1,iff(Severity=~'Medium',2,3))
 | extend ['Rule Category'] = Category
 | order by severitylevel asc
 | project Severity, ['Rule Name'], ['Trigger Time'] = TimeGenerated,['Rule Category'], Query, Description, severitylevel, Id
content.title: Security Rule triggered

content.query:
sentinelscanreport_CL
| where type_s =~ "Detection" 
| where pid_s =~ "{Id}"
| join 
(sentinelscanreportdetails_CL) on $left.pid_s==$right.pid_s
| project details = todynamic(details_s)
| evaluate bag_unpack(details)
| extend HostCustomEntity =column_ifexists('HostCustomEntity', ''), IPCustomEntity =  column_ifexists('IPCustomEntity', ''), AccountCustomEntity = column_ifexists('AccountCustomEntity', ''), SubscriptionId = column_ifexists('SubscriptionId', ''),ResourceId =  column_ifexists('ResourceId', '')
| join kind=leftouter ( 
Heartbeat | distinct Computer, _ResourceId, SubscriptionId
| project omsagent = Computer, omsagent_resourceId = _ResourceId, omsagent_subscriptionId = SubscriptionId
) on $left.HostCustomEntity == $right.omsagent
| extend ResourceId = iff(ResourceId<>'',ResourceId, omsagent_resourceId), SubscriptionId = iff(SubscriptionId<>'',SubscriptionId, omsagent_subscriptionId)

content.query:
let ipaddress = '{ipaddress}';
AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where PublicIPs_s <> ''
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where PublicIPAddress =~ ipaddress
| summarize Calls = count() by SrcIP_s, DestIP_s , PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s, FlowDirection_s
| project Calls, SourceIP = iff(SrcIP_s<>'',SrcIP_s,PublicIPAddress), DestinationIP = iff(DestIP_s<>'',DestIP_s,PublicIPAddress), Protocol = strcat(L7Protocol_s,'(',toint(DestPort_d),')') ,Directory = iff(FlowDirection_s=='I','In','Out'), Statis = iff(FlowStatus_s=='A','Allowed','Denied')
| top 100 by Calls desc
content.title: Traffic Analytics for public IP Address

content.query:
let ipaddress = '{ipaddress}';
let maxnode = 10;
let outtointernet = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where PublicIPs_s <> '' and FlowDirection_s == 'O' and FlowStatus_s=='A'
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where PublicIPAddress =~ ipaddress and PublicIPAddress <> SrcIP_s
| summarize Calls = count() by SrcIP_s, PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s
| project sourceIp = SrcIP_s, targetIP = PublicIPAddress, Calls, Type = strcat(L7Protocol_s,'(',toint(DestPort_d),')')
| top maxnode by Calls desc;
let frominternet = AzureNetworkAnalytics_CL
| where PublicIPs_s <> '' and FlowDirection_s == 'I' and FlowStatus_s=='A'
| extend PublicIPAddress = tostring(split(PublicIPs_s,"|")[0])
| where PublicIPAddress =~ ipaddress and DestIP_s <> PublicIPAddress
| summarize Calls = count() by DestIP_s, PublicIPAddress, FlowStatus_s, DestPort_d, L7Protocol_s
| project sourceIp = PublicIPAddress, targetIP = DestIP_s, Calls, Type = strcat(L7Protocol_s,'(',toint(DestPort_d),')')
| top maxnode by Calls desc;
let links = union outtointernet, frominternet;
let Nodes = outtointernet 
| project Id = sourceIp, Name = sourceIp, Kind = 'VNet' 
| union (
outtointernet 
| project Id = targetIP, Name = targetIP, Kind = 'Internet' 
) 
| union ( 
frominternet
| project Id = sourceIp, Name = sourceIp, Kind = 'Internet' 
) 
| union ( 
frominternet
| project Id = targetIP, Name = targetIP, Kind = 'VNet' 
);
Nodes
| union (links)

content.query:
let AccountActivity_byIP = (v_IP_Address:string){
    AzureActivity
    | where Caller != '' and CallerIpAddress =~ v_IP_Address
    | summarize Account_Aux_StartTime = min(TimeGenerated), 
      Account_Aux_EndTime = max(TimeGenerated), 
      Count = count() by 
      Caller, TenantId
    | top 10 by Count asc nulls last 
    | extend UPN = iff(Caller contains '@', Caller, ''), Account_AadUserId = iff(Caller !contains '@', Caller,'')
    | extend Account_Name = split(UPN,'@')[0] , Account_UPNSuffix = split(UPN,'@')[1]
    | project Account_Name, Account_UPNSuffix, Account_AadUserId, Account_AadTenantId=TenantId, Account_Aux_StartTime , Account_Aux_EndTime 
    };
    AccountActivity_byIP('{ipaddress}')

content.query:
let GetMostPrevUsersbyIP = (v_IP_Address:string){
SigninLogs
| where IPAddress =~ v_IP_Address
| extend RemoteHost = tolower(tostring(parsejson(DeviceDetail['displayName'])))
| extend OS = DeviceDetail.operatingSystem, Browser = DeviceDetail.browser
| extend StatusCode = tostring(Status.errorCode), StatusDetails = tostring(Status.additionalDetails)
| extend State = tostring(LocationDetails.state), City = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| extend info = pack('AppDisplayName', AppDisplayName, 'ClientAppUsed', ClientAppUsed, 'Browser', tostring(Browser), 'IPAddress', IPAddress, 'ResultType', ResultType, 'ResultDescription', ResultDescription, 'Location', Location, 'State', State, 'City', City, 'StatusCode', StatusCode, 'StatusDetails', StatusDetails)
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), max(TimeGenerated), count(), Account_Aux_info = makeset(info) by RemoteHost , UserDisplayName, tostring(OS), UserPrincipalName, AADTenantId, UserId
| top 10 by count_ desc nulls last 
| project Account_Aux_StartTimeUtc = min_TimeGenerated, Account_Aux_EndTimeUtc = max_TimeGenerated, RemoteHost, UserDisplayName, OS, UserPrincipalName, AADTenantId, UserId, Account_Aux_info
| project-rename Account_UnstructuredName=UserPrincipalName, Account_DisplayName=UserDisplayName, Account_AadTenantId=AADTenantId, Account_AadUserId=UserId, Account_Host_UnstructuredName=RemoteHost, Account_Host_OSVersion=OS
};
// change <Address> value below
GetMostPrevUsersbyIP('{ipaddress}')

content.query:
let IPsFromRareLocations = (s_Account_Name:string){
let LocationPrevalence =
SigninLogs
| where UserPrincipalName has s_Account_Name
| extend v_Account_Name = UserPrincipalName
| extend Account_Name = case(
// Handles mixed use scenario of NTDomain\AccountName@UPNSuffix
v_Account_Name has '@' and v_Account_Name has '\\', tostring(split(tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '\\')[1]),'@')[0]),
v_Account_Name has '@', tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '@')[0]),
v_Account_Name has '\\', tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '\\')[1]),
v_Account_Name
)
| project-rename Account_AadUserId = UserId
| extend FullLocation = strcat(Location,'|', LocationDetails.state, '|', LocationDetails.city)
| summarize ConnectionCount = count() by FullLocation, UserPrincipalName, IPAddress, Account_Name, Account_AadUserId;
LocationPrevalence
| summarize make_list(IPAddress), make_list(FullLocation), make_list(ConnectionCount), dcount(FullLocation), totalActivity = sum(ConnectionCount) by UserPrincipalName, Account_AadUserId
| mvexpand Location = list_FullLocation, ConnectionCount = list_ConnectionCount, IPAddress = list_IPAddress
| extend Location = tostring(Location), ConnectionCount = toint(ConnectionCount), IPAddress = tostring(IPAddress)
| extend percentOfActivity = 100*round(todouble(ConnectionCount)/totalActivity,4)
| where percentOfActivity < 10
| project UserPrincipalName, Account_AadUserId, IPAddress, Location, ConnectionCount, percentOfActivity
| sort by percentOfActivity asc, ConnectionCount desc
| top 10 by percentOfActivity asc
| extend IP_Location_Country = tostring(split(Location,'|')[0]), IP_Location_Region = tostring(split(Location,'|')[1]), IP_Location_City = tostring(split(Location,'|')[2])
| extend Account_Aux_info = pack('PercentOfActivity', percentOfActivity, 'ConnectionCount', ConnectionCount)
| parse UserPrincipalName with Account_NTDomain '\\' *
| project Account_UnstructuredName = UserPrincipalName, Account_NTDomain,  Account_AadUserId, IP_Address = IPAddress, IP_Location_Country, IP_Location_Region, IP_Location_City, Account_Aux_info
};
// Where <Name> is the UserName such as John from John@contoso.com, <UPNSuffix> is the domain such as contoso.com from John@contoso.com and <AadUserId> is the GUID assigned in AAD to the user
IPsFromRareLocations('{accountname}')

content.query:
let GetAllHostsbyAccount = (v_Account_Name:string){
SigninLogs
| extend v_Account_Name = case(
v_Account_Name has '@', tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '@')[0]),
v_Account_Name has '\\', tostring(split(v_Account_Name, '\\')[1]),
v_Account_Name
)
| extend targetaccount = iff(v_Account_Name<>'',v_Account_Name,'administrator')
| where UserPrincipalName contains targetaccount
| extend RemoteHost = tolower(tostring(parsejson(DeviceDetail['displayName'])))
| extend OS = DeviceDetail.operatingSystem, Browser = DeviceDetail.browser
| extend StatusCode = tostring(Status.errorCode), StatusDetails = tostring(Status.additionalDetails)
| extend State = tostring(LocationDetails.state), City = tostring(LocationDetails.city)
| extend info = pack('UserDisplayName', UserDisplayName, 'UserPrincipalName', UserPrincipalName, 'AppDisplayName', AppDisplayName, 'ClientAppUsed', ClientAppUsed, 'Browser', tostring(Browser), 'IPAddress', IPAddress, 'ResultType', ResultType, 'ResultDescription', ResultDescription, 'Location', Location, 'State', State, 'City', City, 'StatusCode', StatusCode, 'StatusDetails', StatusDetails)
| summarize min(TimeGenerated), max(TimeGenerated), Host_Aux_info = makeset(info) by RemoteHost , tostring(OS)
| project min_TimeGenerated, max_TimeGenerated, RemoteHost, OS, Host_Aux_info
| top 10 by min_TimeGenerated desc nulls last 
| project-rename Host_UnstructuredName=RemoteHost, Host_OSVersion=OS, Host_Aux_StartTime=min_TimeGenerated, Host_Aux_EndTime=max_TimeGenerated
};
// change <Name> value below
GetAllHostsbyAccount('{accountname}')

inputs.body:
Heartbeat
| where Computer =~ '@{variables('computer')}'
| distinct Computer, ComputerIP, _ResourceId, SubscriptionId
| project Computer, ComputerIP, ResourceId = _ResourceId , SubscriptionId

sentinelscanreport_CL
| where type_s =~ "Detection" 
| where pid_s =~ "@{items('For_each')?['Id']}"
| join 
(sentinelscanreportdetails_CL) on $left.pid_s==$right.pid_s
| project details = todynamic(details_s)
| evaluate bag_unpack(details)
| extend HostCustomEntity =column_ifexists('HostCustomEntity', ''), IPCustomEntity =  column_ifexists('IPCustomEntity', ''), AccountCustomEntity = column_ifexists('AccountCustomEntity', ''), SubscriptionId = column_ifexists('SubscriptionId', ''),ResourceId =  column_ifexists('ResourceId', '')

//look for last Windows Security Alerts only
let timeframe= 10m;
sentinelscanreport_CL
| where type_s =~ "Detection" 
| where count_d != 0 and TimeGenerated >= ago(timeframe)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated,*), repeated = count() by rulename_s, Category, query_s,severity_s, description_s,  pid_s
| project TimeGenerated, Rule = rulename_s,  Description =description_s,Category, Severity = severity_s, repeated, Query = query_s, TimeSpan = timespan_s, Id = pid_s
